Please could you assist me to update a few more things on the MS Trials website

On the MS Trials website news page https://mstrials.org.au/news/ it is currently linking through to the below page which is not formatted correctly. Please can we remove this interim news landing page and direct the read more news from the trials site (and the Brain Bank website) to just go directly to the MS Australia main news page https://www.msaustralia.org.au/news/





Thank you so much


Kindest regards
Trish
